id='P001' name='Mobile Learner On-the-Go' background='These users value the flexibility of learning anywhere, often using mobile devices during commutes or in between other activities. id='P002' name='Motivated Self-Improver' background='These users are proactive in their learning, seeking platforms that help them upskill and track progress.
